input: The mind of the makers of the Constitution of India is reflected in which of the following?

options.C: The Directive Principles of State Policy
options.D: The Fundamental Duties Union & Its Territories

explanation: Sir Alladi Krishnaswami Iyer, a member of the Constituent Assembly, had said ‘The Preamble to our Constitution expresses what we had thought or dreamt so long.” So “A” is the answer.
